docs.title: 代码高亮示例
docs.text:
def quicksort(arr):
    if len(arr) <= 1:
        return arr
    pivot = arr[len(arr) // 2]
    left = [x for x in arr if x < pivot]
    middle = [x for x in arr if x == pivot]
    right = [x for x in arr if x > pivot]
    return quicksort(left) + middle + quicksort(right)

docs.title: LaTeX 数学公式
docs.text:
行内公式: \(E = mc^2\)

块级公式: $$ \nabla \times \vec{\mathbf{B}} - \frac{\partial \vec{\mathbf{E}}}{\partial t} = \mu_0 \vec{\mathbf{J}} $$

docs.title: 提示框示例
docs.text:
复杂度分析

  • 时间复杂度: \(O(n \log n)\)
  • 空间复杂度: \(O(n)\)
# Python 示例
print("Hello with Python tag")

// C++ 示例
#include <iostream>
int main() {
  std::cout << "Hello with C++ tag";
}

// Java 示例
public class Main {
  public static void main(String[] args) {
    System.out.println("Hello with Java tag");
  }
}
